website_summaries.verdict: A convenient, once-daily multivitamin complete with your RDA of vitamins D and B, as well as important minerals.
pros: Coated to make it easy to swallow
Wide array of vitamins and minerals in a once-daily pill
Ingredients support hormonal health and immune system
cons: Some concerns about food coloring in pill
A few reports of stomach upset

customer_reviews.title: WARNING! Might melt in shipment!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a mess! All the gummies melted in shipment and I received an unsalvagable bottle of goo. I had read that some customers received their vitamins in chilled packages, but clearly mine didn’t make the cut. Normally these gummies are my go to for vitamin taking, and I was wanting to save a little money before buying at Walmart, but I guess that bit me in the butt!
customer_reviews.author: Miss.Huntress

customer_reviews.title: They look and smell bad
customer_reviews.text: So I got these vitamins in the mail today, I opened it and it had a weird smell and I looked inside and they all had a weird yellow tint on them and one of them didn't even look like a gummy anymore it was all yellow as you can see in the picture. I'm not sure if i can return or just throw it out or what to do with it. But I would recommend just buying these at the store so you can see them first.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like hell on earth.
customer_reviews.text: So I’ve purchased these in the past multiple times. No issues. I reordered earlier this week and for some reason, they taste HORRIBLE. To the point where I almost threw them up in the sink. I’m not pleased I spent the money to get something I have to throw away. Never again will I order these from amazon. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: celeste

customer_reviews.title: Seems to promote healthy nails and hair!
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my second bottle of these. The gummies are tasty and definitely easier to take than a multi vitamin tablet. Since using these, my nails and hair are growing and are in better condition than they had been. I've had a split in one of my nails for a fe years, and it's grown out completely. I'm pretty satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: CabushkaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I appreciate that they aren't overly sugary in texture or flavor and they're easy to chew (important as I currently have braces)
customer_reviews.text: As a mom of four, two being one year old twins I was shocked at how much my energy levels jumped after I started taking these. I appreciate that they aren't overly sugary in texture or flavor and they're easy to chew (important as I currently have braces). They also gave my metabolism the boost it needed to finally shed the last 10lbs of baby weight I was carrying with no additional effort or changes made. My husband was so impressed he started taking the men's formula with similar results!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love the product but not the source
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product and normally would give it five stars, but I'd get it from a different source than I happened to. My product took months to arrive and the gummies were hard-to-chew and seemed old. I've bought the same thing from other sources and then it always was much easier to chew. I was going to buy the comparable Walmart product (which usually I am 100 percent happy with), but this is one of the rare cases where the store-brand products, though seemingly the same, don't have nearly the same strength of the nutrients. Normally I hate raspberry flavor, but whatever flavors these are is acceptable for me. It's my daily treat for myself.
customer_reviews.author: DN

customer_reviews.title: Noticeable results - LOVE these vitamins!
customer_reviews.text: These taste great and are very good quality. I've noticed a drastic improvement in my hair, skin, and nails. I also used to have a lot of bruises on my legs that seemed to not want to go away until I started taking these vitamins. Now I don't have any more embarrassing shin bruises and my hair/nails grow fast and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: They are delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Being in my mid 30s, it is crucial to take care of your body. However, having depression can make it near impossible to care for yourself. Coming out of a deep depression myself, I grabbed these to help get the proper vitamins in my body. They are a perfect gummy vitamin. Chewing is easy, taste is really good. I don't feel all that sluggish anymore, it's easy to jump out of bed too. Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Tully

customer_reviews.title: Good vitamin
customer_reviews.text: Some multi-vitamins cause me to feel a wave of extreme nausea about 10 minutes after I take them. I love that I never have that feeling after taking these multi-vitamins from Vitafusion. While they taste great and are even fun to take, what I don't like is that they contain sugar. Hence, the deduction of one star.
customer_reviews.author: cinnamon girl

customer_reviews.title: No more bruises!
customer_reviews.text: I had small bruises that were randomly popping up on my legs, despite the fact that I hadn't bumped into anything. This had been happening for months. I was on another multivitamin and ran out, so I decided to try this one. Within a week, no more bruises! It's been about a month now, and still no bruises. These taste really good, and I like that you take 2 a day. I take a pill that tastes DISGUSTING twice a day, so I take the gummy vitamin right after and it makes my day a little better :). I will continue to reorder this vitamin.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Good Vitamin Gummies
customer_reviews.text: These vitamin gummies aren't bad. They contain plenty of essential vitamins and minerals. They're sweet, but not the best gummy vitamins I've tasted. However, that's not the priority here. As long as they're mildly tasty, it's worth it. There are some extra supplements that I appreciate in here: Choline, Inositol and Boron are great for you. This jar is huge and contains 150 gummies. It's a great deal for the affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: P@¡n ₩@rr¡0rTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: I don't understand the positive reviews! They are unchewable!
customer_reviews.text: These cannot be chewed. I chew and chew and they stay whole. I can't imagine they break down well enough to work given you basically have to swallow them whole. And unfortunately, I bought several products in this line. There's "gummy" and then there's rubbery and these are definitely more like rubber! Given the number of positive reviews maybe I got a bad jar or something, but given this wasn't the only item of this gummy line I tried, I tend to doubt it.
customer_reviews.author: Elentari

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and nutritious!
customer_reviews.text: Best gummy vitamins I've ever had. I've never been a fan of the chewy ones, since they tasted super sugary and always stuck together in a huge lump inside the container. They've definitely improved their formula! Not only is the taste much "fresher" (in fact, I look forward to my morning "treat"), but the vitamins no longer stick together (no more digging with one finger and trying to tear them apart). I'll be ordering more for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Gillins

customer_reviews.title: perfect for adults
customer_reviews.text: I really like these vitamins. I noticed positive improvements in my skin, hair, and nails after using them even though they are more of a general vitamin and not a skin, hair, and nail supplement. I like that they have a two piece dosage so I can take less or more as desired. I used to purchase kids' gummy vitamins but didn't like the salty, sugary coating on them. These are more like fruit snacks without that "sour patch kid" stuff on them and I like that. They have a faint berry flavor that is pleasant without overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M

customer_reviews.title: My NEW FAVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Two of these a day are all you need. They taste good and really do work to keep you feeling energetic. I have tried many different kinds, and these are one of my FAVES! One note: These are not super soft gummies, so you will need to chew these for a while. These are probably the best gummy women's vitamins out there.. hands down... and last twice as long as other brands!
customer_reviews.author: Mia P.

customer_reviews.title: Too toxic for me
customer_reviews.text: Three after consuming the gumies I started to have chest and stomach pain when coughing. I was so uncomfortable and nauseous. Then my kidneys were hurting. I had to run to the restrooms every hour and noticed my urines had a dark yellow color. I checked online the symptoms and found out it was an excess of vitamin B which was weird. All the symptoms stopped after stopping using the gumies and bought a different store brand.
customer_reviews.author: Sooniami

customer_reviews.title: I usually buy these in the store and love them. unfortunately these came in the mail and ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy these in the store and love them. unfortunately these came in the mail and they were spoiled. they tasted like sour milk. i wont buy again. must have been the heat.
customer_reviews.author: G cat

customer_reviews.title: I guess shipping to Arizona doesn’t work in the summer.
customer_reviews.text: The product came melted again. This is the second time
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Breaks me out
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what's in this that causes my skin to break out in a bunch of tiny bumps that take weeks to clear up. I've tried on four separate occasions to test this out but without fail my skin punishes me within 2 days. I really wish it worked for me because they do taste good which is why I gave it two stars.
customer_reviews.author: Infinity

customer_reviews.title: Taste great!!!
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins are great!! I struggle with horse pills and have tried other gummy vitamins and all were no good. I bought these after searching and decided to order after all the great reviews. They taste great, not a hard gummy but also not sticky. Great flavor and they even came with an ice pack to keep them from melting. I honestly think they are what have helped me lose 8lbs..i no longer snack like I use to. They obviously have great vitamins that my body was lacking! I love them and highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: rubber junk !
customer_reviews.text: junk ,u cant chew RUBBER ! throw one in a glass of water ,it will not desolve in 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: zebra

customer_reviews.title: Good vitamins
customer_reviews.text: Great vitamins. I take 2 in the morning before I leave for work and they give me a lot of energy. Big bottle, gummies were not stuck together and they taste well. A little on the chewy side but they are great.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonLyyfe

customer_reviews.title: Candy
customer_reviews.text: Tasted good,easy to chew, but nothing for health like hot flash and nails.. I used it for two weeks . I would like to ask if I can take more than two gummies maybe it works.bytheway I would like to thank Amazon and Seller they're great. Unfortunately gelatin used in some of the VitafusionTM and L'il CrittersTM products is a porcine (pork) based gelatin. This is forbidden from our side. I stopped to take it, and I will get rid of all the products.😭😭
customer_reviews.author: MARIAM MOHAMAD ABOHAIDER

customer_reviews.title: These DO help the hair grow
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking these a little over 2 months now. Sometimes I take 4 at a time. Within one month I noticed a change in my hair. Even when my mother flew in from out of state and felt my hair, she said, "Your hair feels thicker." That's because it is. I like these better than biotin gummies because incredibly high doses of biotin make me break out in horrible acne. Plus, I've been reading such high doses can cause blood clots if you're not careful. These specific gummies have the perfect balance of vitamins, and they DO work.
customer_reviews.author: SparklesTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Favorite multivitamin
customer_reviews.text: These taste incredible, I'd never even know that they were helping me. I bought these after seeing the reviews. I wasn't suffering from vitally low levels from any of the vitamins in this gummy but to have an additional boost couldn't hurt. I'm towards the end of my bottle and I would have thought they'd get gross after a while but they haven't and won't even when I finish. I'd definitely recommend these to others.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: So impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Ever since I had my son I'm terrible at taking pills for some reason. I always gag. It's very frustrating. It was so bad that my Dr. told me to take gummy vitamins and prenatals. Most gummy vitamin are nasty and taste like pennies. These vitamins taste like candy and are super easy to eat. They even smell delicious. Most gummy vitamins also are higher in sugar and calorie count, these are not. I am very impressed and will continue to purchase them.
customer_reviews.author: AliciaTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Nice Price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mult-vitamin for those that have problems swallowing a large capsule. Tasty selection of flavors. 2 a day provide all essential vitamins and minerals that my wife needs. She has rheumatoid arthritis and takes several other medications daily so she appreciates being able to chew them. Similar products in our local stores are often stale and stuck together and are often more expensive. Don`t worry as these come packed thermally protected with a reusable ice pack. Remember to keep them in a cool location.
customer_reviews.author: Greg J

customer_reviews.title: Love these vitamins!
customer_reviews.text: These gummy vitamins are just what I was looking for. Regular vitamins tend to be too large to swallow, so these chewables are perfect. They taste like berries too! They have a well-rounded combination of vitamins and minerals that are important to womens' health. I will buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: C Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: I feel so much better now
customer_reviews.text: I had been feeling exhausted and run down the past few months and could never figure out why I felt so bad. I decided to start these vitamins a few weeks ago and the difference has been truly AMAZING. I have energy again and feel one hundred percent better. I was skeptical that these would work and they have been better than I ever expected.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Easy to take and good tasting multi vitamins
customer_reviews.text: I can't take the huge multivitamin pills so I bought these gummies for supplement. They taste great (fruity) and has the supplements of a multivitamin for women. At least I am getting what I need verses if I purchase the pill form, I will not take. I do not get the nauseous feeling that I get when I take these verses the pill form of the multi.
customer_reviews.author: Rosy

customer_reviews.title: Delish but don't order during hot months
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins are delicious however I don't recommend ordering them in the summer. My vitamins came to me entirely melted together to the top of the bottle. Some of the gummies are still their own shape and able to be pulled apart from the giant lob of gummies, but others are melded together into one giant gummy and I will have to use a knife eventually to separate the individual gummies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy Vitamins
customer_reviews.text: These are really tasty vitamins. I had to go back to regular vitamins, bc I ate more than necessary, and was wasting them. I'm someone whose always trying to remove sugars& sweets from my diet. So maybe someone who normally keeps candy& sweets in their home, these wouldn't be such a great option.:-/ Way too $$ as gummy candy alone, haha
customer_reviews.author: Jill O.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious flavor and scent
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking these vitamins and I really love the flavor. I feel like I'm eating a treat and want to take more. They smell and taste real delicious, doesn't taste like taste like naan vitamin more like a candy. Highly recommend and I'm on the re ordering these so I never run out.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio

customer_reviews.title: Bought because of good lab ratings
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because LabDoor tested the gummies and this was a high ranked one. Vitamin A was the only vitamin which is lower than what the label states, while many others were higher than on the label. 'Vitamin A content was measured at 90 IU/serving, 96.4% below its 2500 IU label claim'
customer_reviews.author: peachiekeen 11

customer_reviews.title: They taste good but not too sweet!
customer_reviews.text: It has always been difficult for me to remember taking a daily vitamin! But, NOT with these! They are easy, taste good but not TOO good! I believe they must have all that I need to be more health-minded because I’ve definitely noticed I am! I want to take better care of myself & this vitamin helps me to remember that! Thank you & please keep telling your customers (& I will keep telling my family & friends how important but EASY these are to help!!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda L. Currie

customer_reviews.title: Opened the bottle to a melted gummy mess!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I would like to mention that I tried to find a way to contact the seller. Unfortunately, I was not successful. I love these vitamins. They're easy to chew, taste good, and provide the nutrients I need. Obviously, the heat in Georgia is too much for them. I opened the bottle to partake in my daily dose and found the gummies melted together. It would have been impossible to separate them. I would appreciate a new bottle to replace the unuseable product I received.
customer_reviews.author: math teacher

customer_reviews.title: Taste Great
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious. I actually look forward to taking my vitamins at night instead of forgetting to take them. Tastes like a normal gummy. It’s like my little reward at the end of the day. Haven’t felt any different since taking them, but haven’t felt worse since switching from my old vitamins to these
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Best gummy vitamins!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the flavor of these gummies! It's tempting not to eat a whole bunch of them! In regards to the vitamins and their absorbancy, I believe they do really help me and my health. Whenever I would get my blood checked while taking these vitamins, all my results came back good and my doctor would state that I'm getting the proper amount of vitamins and nutrients for my body. I eat 2 gummies every morning and they are great! Would really recommend these to others, especially those that dislike swallowing vitamin pills or any vitamins that have unpleasant tastes.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Tough to chew
customer_reviews.text: These gummies are rubbery and tough to chew. It’s just this multi vitamin, their other products are softer. I’ll be buying another brand multi vitamins from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Luv'n Life

customer_reviews.title: Edible and healthy
customer_reviews.text: In terms of gummy vitamins? Look at the nutrition label and stop being so picky about the taste. You're getting the ease of literally an impossible amount of nutrients in two 'off' berry flavored bites, I think you can survive.
customer_reviews.author: Micci Dow

customer_reviews.title: Tasty!
customer_reviews.text: These taste great! After a few weeks of taking multivitamins I have noticed an increase in my energy levels. I feel like these are a win-win, they taste great and make me feel great! Not to mention, they are very fairly priced for multivitamins. Packaging was fine, nothing damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Meegan

customer_reviews.title: The taste is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: It tastes great! And there's a lot of great vitamins in this gummy. The B vitamins might make your urine bright yellow, that's normal. The biotin makes your skin, hair, and nails very beautiful. And the B-12 keeps that afternoon energy slump away. Great vitamin for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: chelsea s.

customer_reviews.title: Made me Hungry
customer_reviews.text: This vitamin made me eat more and gain weight. As soon as i realized it I stopped I was on my second bottle and my apetitite went back to normal. I was eating all the time. I think this is an item I want to buy at my local health food store where i know they know. Seems to work for eveyone else. I Usually purchase by 4 stars and a lot of reviews, just did not work for me in this case.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Dakin

customer_reviews.title: Taste snd texture made me sick
customer_reviews.text: These were name brand vitamins so I thought they would be good. They are like chewing a tough gummy bear, and the flavors are just gross. I ate them at first 😏 but it got where the smell and taste made me sick 🤢. I tried swallowing them whole; but it felt like I had swallowed a tennis ball and it was caught in my throat 😬 I had bought my husband the same brand but for men. I dumped mine in with his. He takes anything I put in his pill keeper, and he says he likes them ok. Just weren't for me I guess.
customer_reviews.author: vicsgirl

customer_reviews.title: How do I know?
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins taste great, like gummy bears, etc. So I actually look forward to taking them instead of dreading to swallow another pill in the morning. I take them because I am supposed to take them. I have no idea of whether they do or do not make me more healthy. I'll have to take the word of the people who study such things.
customer_reviews.author: RLG

customer_reviews.title: Expiration date was more than a year prior to my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Had an order of two bottles. Just opened the second bottle (past return window). It kind of poofed out a big woof of air like a canned good gone bad. And the gummies stank. Was difficult to find the expiration date, but I did. This expired 6/2018--more than a year before I placed my order. My guess is that this seller grabs expired products from commercial trash.
customer_reviews.author: books n bargains

customer_reviews.title: Very close to candy
customer_reviews.text: I worry about kids getting ahold of these as even I can feel tempted to eat more than 2 since they are basically the same as “gummy” candies. As far as absorption goes, I don’t know how I could possibly know but if anyone out there can tell me I’d love to know. I take them and just hope I’m not being a sucker and being fooled by the vitamin company who as we all know are not backed up by the FDA. If they were not so easy to eat I doubt I would buy them. There is a sucker born every second!
customer_reviews.author: Lisle

customer_reviews.title: Easier than pills!
customer_reviews.text: Tasty and easy to stay with daily habit. Most multi-vitamins are very big, so I started purchasing "Petite" multis, but the smell was horrible and made me gag. These are tasty and after chewing the daily 2, I find myself wanting to have another (but I don't). Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Richards

customer_reviews.title: Great multi-vitamins that are easy on the stomach!
customer_reviews.text: Nice tasting vitamins that provide the daily essentials. I also take a calcium supplement because my calcium needs for my diagnosed osteoporosis, are greater than what these provide. These are still great vitamins that are easy on my stomach, which is a huge concern for me. I like that they have been tested for absorption and are made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: family 4

customer_reviews.title: Congealed Mess
customer_reviews.text: i wouldn't know about absorbency - stupid question. i bought this product before at Costco (no problems) and once before at Amazon (no problem). This last Amazon purchase was a disaster. A chunk of the gummies in one bottle congealed into a slab. What a mess! I will buy only from Costco in the future. I can return easier if I have a problem.
customer_reviews.author: NoH

customer_reviews.title: Good vitamins for a fair price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife and there's no queasiness on an empty stomach when taken. Her blood test consistently shows the right amount of vitamins in her system. She's been taking them for about 2 years now.
customer_reviews.author: John Mouner

customer_reviews.title: These taste like rubbery fish!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought these at least a dozen times locally. These DO NOT TASTE THE SAME!!! They have a strange fishy taste and smell. The texture is rubbery instead of soft. I question why these taste so bad compared to buying locally. So I bought another bottle locally with same expiration and guess what? They taste weird too and are rubbery. Something has changed from the manufacturer. Possibly because they would start sticking when it was warm? I hope this company goes back to the original formula or I'll start looking for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonHonestReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived melted together!
customer_reviews.text: I imagine these would have been ok if they hadn't been stuck altogether like a rock wall! Very pretty, but not for intended use. Amazon accepted my return for a refund, but didn't want the vitamins back. Into the landfill they go! i usually order another gummie vitamin, since I have trouble swallowing pills and have not had that problem with the other brand. They are also dusted with a light layer of sugar, which helps.
customer_reviews.author: petlover of 7

customer_reviews.title: Good product: wasteful shipping
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Flavor is delightful, price is good. No water needed so I am more likely to take them when I walk past the bottle and remember, before I get distracted by something else. Only major complaint is the packaging. I ordered 4 of these to give out at Christmas. They came individually boxed with plastic pillows. All 4 would easily have fit in one box. I don’t understand where the packing system broke down on Amazon’s end to be so wasteful and unnecessary.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Vitafusion Gummy Vitamins - For Ladies
customer_reviews.text: I like what is and isn't in these small gummies. These have better ingredients than my +50 Women's vitamins by Bayer. No glycols! No heavy metals! There is a slight putrid odor at first sniff. It dissipates quickly. I smell this each and every time I open the bottle top then the berry scent surrounds me. I smell scents other people do not notice; I have no idea why.
customer_reviews.author: BanTrophyHunting

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good, not stuck together, reuseable strong container
customer_reviews.text: They have a gummy-worm (candy) texture, for chewing. A moderately fruity flavor, with a hint of vitamin. They were not stuck together, only slightly adhereing to one another. Note that a daily dose is two pieces, so this is a 75 day supply. The container is PETE Polyethylene terephthalate, clear, solid, with a reuseable, solid screw top. The label is easily stripped off with no glue residue. This leaves a clear, reusable bottle of about 18 oz volume. The opening is 1 7/8" diameter.
customer_reviews.author: A. Garland

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting!
customer_reviews.text: Who knew gummies for adults would taste so good! I actually look forward to these every day because they taste just like candy! I take them with Omega-3 gummies from the same company and love them both. These are a great way to supplement all those vitamins and minerals that my body needs that I don't get from my food intake. These are great and I will definitely repurchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: My Go to!
customer_reviews.text: I am almost 21 and I have used these since I was 13 and when I tell you that these really helped my body it did! Glad I was able to come back to these after so many years. I was lacking lots of vitamins and I wanted to get a multivitamin and why not turn to these! And amazing price for 150!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Guillermo

customer_reviews.title: Love the convenience of being an Amazon customer.
customer_reviews.text: I am a Vitafusion customer and have been for years, By purchasing my vitamins through Amazon, I am able to get a larger size bottle at a better price than my local store. Also, I have placed these on an automatic refill status so I can make sure I always have my vitamins on hand. This is a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Imagene Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: They are OK, unless....
customer_reviews.text: I first purchased these at Walmart. The subscribe and save on Amazon hooked me! When I took two of these of day as stated, it doesn't seem to do quite well, at all. I increased it to taking three then regularly started taking two in the morning and two right before bed. NOW, they work wonderful. I feel more energetic. Honestly, for the price, I don't have an issue ordering them every month at the price.
customer_reviews.author: E. D. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Hard to chew
customer_reviews.text: Extremely hard to chew and I have been having to heat it up in my hands before attempting to chew them. I wish they were the consistency of their Biotin gummies. UPDATE 6/13/19 Just bought a second bottle through Amazon again and the gummies are so much softer than the first batch! In the future I’ll be purchasing at a Walmart so if I get a bad batch again I’ll actually be able to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Jamesnjeans

customer_reviews.title: Product: Good - Effectiveness: idk
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. It taste good which made it easy for me to consume. I eat two a day and drink 1 bottle of water afterwards. I'm not sure if it has made a difference in my life now that I am taking them. I feel the same as I did before I started to take them. Idk maybe it's just me but anywho, I like the product and I would recommend it to someone who says they neee vitamins
customer_reviews.author: King Ty

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I can't attest to the quality of the vitamins themselves. The vitamins arrived completely melted and stuck together. I tried putting them in the fridge, but still couldn't pull them apart. Very disappointed and I will just end up throwing them away.
customer_reviews.author: Ayriana

customer_reviews.title: Taste good / shipping bad
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the product, but it showed up completely melted together. I went to return it, and this item is apparently non-returnable. They should tell you that before you buy it. I buy other gummies (for sleeping) from Nature’s Bounty and they ship it with a cold pouch to prevent it from melting. I’m super disappointed with this right now.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: When it works, it just works.
customer_reviews.text: Out of all the countless gummy vitamins I have tried, it always leads me back to this brand. The taste is yummy and it dissolves easily without leaving a weird taste in my mouth. I've experienced no problems with shipping or delivery. Why change? The price is economically fair. I get 150 gummies for 10 bucks! Yes, I'm sticking with this brand for sure. Worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: written by Tandreia

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting mysterious growth on vitamin
customer_reviews.text: My son said this morning, “Mommy is that a fingernail in your vitamin?” There is a disgusting substance growing on my vitamin. Vitafusion provides no email address or way of sending them a photo, so Amazon review it is...
customer_reviews.author: Va

customer_reviews.title: Get these vitamins!
customer_reviews.text: I've used these vitamins for a few months and truly can tell the difference. I stopped using for two weeks and my energy was not the same. These vitamins absorb quickly with no after taste. These easy to chew vitamins are really worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Porter

customer_reviews.title: Tasty. Do not order in warm weather.
customer_reviews.text: These taste good. I really don’t know how much gets absorbed, but tasting like candy helps motivate me to want to take them daily and they don’t make me feel sick like regular vitamins. I would recommend buying them in a store if it’s warm outside as mine arrived melted together in a solid lump.
customer_reviews.author: HoneyBeeHippie

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, texture, and price for a womens gummy multivitamin that works
customer_reviews.text: I hate taking pills and was looking for a multivitamin that works great and is not torture to take. This is perfect! I've tried other gummy womens multivitamins but the variety of flavors was mostly orange and lemon with a few berry thrown in. I love the taste and texture of these! I actually look forward to taking my multivitamin now.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Thorn

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor. Many varieties.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I both love the flavor of these gummies. Although, I usually buy him the ones specifically for men lol. I did get burnt out the prenatal ones when I was pregnant, but you couldn't ask for a better flavored gummy that seems to do the job. We will continue to use these as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: I had the Target version of these and loved them. When these were on sale I was so excited to get the real version. Well, I just took my first 2 and they are so chewy and have an off taste. I want to go back to the Target brand. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm taking vitamins daily for the first time in a long time!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these vitamins!!! I haven't been good about taking daily vitamins for years -- just too hard to swallow pills, and they taste terrible. My kids enjoy the gummy vitamins that they take, so I thought I'd see if there was a comparable product for me. This is perfect!! I am so glad I chose this brand as they are delicious. I am glad to find a product that makes it easy to take daily vitamins. Thumbs up from me!
customer_reviews.author: Angie KC

customer_reviews.title: Vitafusion Women's Gummy Vitamins, 150 Count
customer_reviews.text: I'm afraid this product came half melted into a big lump. Tried to pull apart and what a mess. So I stuck it in the frig till the next day. My husband cut off the top of the bottle and then I pulled apart what little I could and chopped the rest up into pieces. I don't see ordering another bottle of these. Taste is great, though!
customer_reviews.author: Crazyfoote

customer_reviews.title: Women's VitaFusion
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking these for a couple of years. Just take 2 every day. I do have to take separate Iron & Vit C that I also ordered from Amazon. You just can't get any of them for a better price anywyere.
customer_reviews.author: JAH

customer_reviews.title: Tastes ok!
customer_reviews.text: These taste ok at least for “vitamins”. I have been buying them for awhile but I will probably stop. Im not sure about the absorption. I just had labs done at the Dr and it didn't show any change from when I first stared taking them. So I feel like Im paying for expensive gummy bears.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Great Vitamins
customer_reviews.text: These are great vitamins - they're chewable, pleasantly flavored, stay very fresh in the bottle, and have repeatedly purchased this brand - won't switch. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: CRUISEGIRL

customer_reviews.title: Doubled in price!
customer_reviews.text: These are very good! So good that the price mysteriously doubled since my last purchase! What, did the quality improve that much? Was the first bottle of lessor quality? Why are these now, three months later doubled in price? I found these at Walmart at much better price !
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Product
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed as all the vitamins melted together, don’t even know how I’ll take it... Waste of money... All of them stuck together!!! Even if I turn upside down won’t come out not a single one... For a prime service it was totally down on my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Carla C. Sheeley

customer_reviews.title: I love the taste and they are nice and soft
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste and they are nice and soft. I also reviewed Smarty Pants Adult vitamins (which I was supposed to take 6 of - and they are GAG sweet). These I take 2 a day, and they are not overly sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Family3D1G

customer_reviews.title: Flavor is Very Good and the Gummies Are Easy to Swallow.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. I can't say one way or the other about how effectively the absorbancy is, but overall I think is a good Vitamin to take for me as a female. Flavor is good and I have no problem in taking them as far as being able to swallow them. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Linda In Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love these vitamins. I went to GNC to look for gummy vitamins and the guy told me that the pills have a lot more vitamins in them. I told him that I would just take double the gummies and bought them on Amazon! They are delicious. I look forward to taking them.
customer_reviews.author: Mark N.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using these Vitamins for a very long time. My blood work looked great at my recent Yearly Exam. I take some extra Vitamin D3 in conjunction to help absorb the calcium in my food. I think that gummies are a great way to take vitamins, you chew them up and I imagine they are easier absorbed by this method.
customer_reviews.author: nancy j. martin

customer_reviews.title: Vitamins got here fast, well packaged, and they smell a little funny but worth it for the boost in vitamins!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal, got the vitamins very quickly. They have a strange smell and lack taste in comparison to the ones not specifically for women, but they are much easier to digest than a huge horse pill. If I know that it is helping me with vitamins especially boosted for women, I'll take efficiency over smell and slight lack of taste. Overall, no complaints here. I got them quickly and effectively boxed with something else. Way to go, Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Delamar-Goss

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable! I’m on my second bottle.
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins have a fantastic taste. They’re genuinely pleasant. Unlike other brands I have tried, these have no bitterness or nasty “flintstone vitamin” taste/smell. They just smell faintly like fruity candy or juice. I look forward to taking them. I have purchased these twice now and will continue.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Be leary
customer_reviews.text: Idk what it is cuz I've taken these from Walmart before and no issues, but these have caused the worse taste in my mouth that lasted as long as I took them which has been almost a month. I tried to see if itd go away...but no. I quit them 4 days ago and finally today the horrible taste is leaving. Be leary.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Williams

customer_reviews.title: Decent-tasting gummy vitamin
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these vitamins for a few years now. They're easy to take since they're chewable and have a decent flavor. They leave sort of a weird aftertaste for me but it's a vitamin so I'm not expecting it to taste like candy haha. The price is right for the amount of vitamins you get. I've never had any noticeable side effects or otherwise negative impact from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Avery

customer_reviews.title: Easy way to get your vitamins
customer_reviews.text: I normally don’t tolerate multivitamins in tablet forms because they upset my stomach to the point of vomiting even when taken with a meal. I can take these on an empty stomach and no upset. I am WAY better at remembering to take a vitamin with these and they taste great. I’ve been using these for a while now. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste and Quality
customer_reviews.text: There are FEW gummy vitamins that don't TASTE like vitamins. This tastes like candy in the best way, and has the right ingredients for women my age. There is a more organic option with this brand too that I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shana S.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order these vitamins on Amazon. Mine were completely melted together for the 2nd time.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd time ordering this item. Both times they were completely melted together into a blob. Imagine my surprise when I click the return icon and get the lovely news that they are non returnable. Guess you got me, won’t ever order again.
customer_reviews.author: candycane

customer_reviews.title: No temp control...
customer_reviews.text: Came all melted together on one side. Not kept in temp-control areas I assume. Very unhappy about it.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Arrived completely melted together
customer_reviews.text: The entire jar of vitamins arrived melted together. Which, I suppose maybe I shouldn't have bought them in August in the southwest. But there are no returns or refund requests for this item. I hope this serves as a helpful warning to folks who might want to buy gummy vitamins from this seller in the Summer. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Sunday

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend these gummies!
customer_reviews.text: I love gummy vitamins! I have a sensitive stomach and these help me get my vitamins in. Also, the aftertaste is not so strong.
customer_reviews.author: diana soriano

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this over a month ago, I just opened it today and realized the taste is kind os bitter. I am so upset because I can’t return this product anymore since its been over a month and I have bought 3 of these. Not only did it not make me feel better but it gave me a headache after being swallowed. What’s bothering even more is when I checked the authenticity of the reviews only a 10% of them are actually reliable. I lost money and I’m really upset, son don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Esther Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Now I enjoy taking my vitamins!
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins taste great—and I’m so thankful! I have to take so many medications and supplements on a regular basis that I couldn’t possibly force down any more pills each day. Instead of dreading taking my vitamins, I actually look forward to taking them at the end of the day. Vitafusion gummies rock!
customer_reviews.author: K. Stippes

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting way to get your vitamins!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely hate taking vitamins- they're usually disgusting! But these taste great and have a lot of B vitamins in it. I was just about to buy a B vitamin complex before I found these and I was super impressed by the amount of B that these have. I've only been taking them for about two weeks now so I can't really tell a difference but it usually takes 4-6 weeks for vitamins to do their job so I'm hopeful about these!
customer_reviews.author: MDH

customer_reviews.title: Fresh vitamins easy to chew.
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking these chewable vitamins for a few years. I used to buy them at big box store or grocery store. I was amazed with my recent Amazon order. The product was so much fresher and easier to chew. Will buy this from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeandot

customer_reviews.title: A very good and easy to take vitamin
customer_reviews.text: These are really good vitamins. I was a little leary about trying them because I didn't think gummy vitamins would have the same potency as a regular multivitamin, but these seem better. I've been taking them for about a month and wanted to make sure they were good before I did the "subscribe and save".
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Cagle

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and do the job!
customer_reviews.text: I love these vitamins! I was purchasing Target brand gummy vitamins but I love that these come in a huge bottle and last me a lot longer. They taste really good and I definitely feel a difference when I don't take them for a few weeks. The vitamins help me sleep better, stay more alert, and just feel my best every day.
customer_reviews.author: marymodern

customer_reviews.title: Shop around
customer_reviews.text: This product is cheaper then what you can find in the store and my only complaint is the texture and taste. They are not very tasty and i would have had to keep up blood test reguraly to determine if my vitamin level was right due to the product. I would shop the fda and critic review websites before making this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie kohn

customer_reviews.title: Will keep getting!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several gummy vitamins in the past. I was very skeptical of trying them again because a lot of them leave an awful after taste, or have high amounts of sugar that end up hurting my teeth which are very sensitive. I am very pleased to say I LOVE these vitamins and will continue to order/use. The flavor is great, and the texture of them is a little firmer than the super squishy ones which I personally prefer!!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

product_meta.title: Vitafusion Women's Gummy Vitamins
product_meta.description: vitafusion Women's gummy vitamins provide a complete multivitamin formula that has been formulated to support the specific health needs of women. A fusion of essential vitamins, minerals and natural berry flavors, these great-tasting gummies provide a convenient alternative to hard-to-swallow pills.
feature_bullets: A complete multivitamin + Antioxidant vitamins C and E specially formulated to support the specific health needs of women
A convenient alternative to hard-to-swallow pills
Contains NO high-fructose corn syrup, NO artificial sweeteners, NO gluten, NO dairy and NO synthetic (FD&C) dyes
Recipient of the 2018 ChefsBest Excellence Award. The ChefsBest Excellence Award is awarded to brands that surpass quality standards established by independent professional chefs
